explains: n. 数字，数量符号；数词

sentences.en: Map this number to the Roman numeral system.
sentences.cn: 将这个数字映射到罗马数字系统。

sentences.en: For instance, take a number from the Arabic numeral system, such as 9.
sentences.cn: 例如，从阿拉伯数字系统中取出一个数字，比如说 9。

sentences.en: Now map that back to the Arabic numeral system and you end up with, no surprise, 9.
sentences.cn: 现在把它映射回阿拉伯数字系统，毫无疑问，你会得到9。
